EmailTemplate.subject: Test Your Knowledge of HTF7000 Authorizations ✈
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you know the difference between a Line, Minor, and Heavy Authorized HTF7000 engine shop?
Understanding the three maintenance authorization levels for the HTF7000 is important so that you choose the right authorized maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) provider to handle your engine needs at any given time.
Duncan Aviation wants to help operators understand the differences between authorization levels, including what type of engine repair and service an MRO can do based on their authorization level. Click below to check out our latest blog, "Aircraft Maintenance Authorizations 101: Understanding the Three Levels of HTF7000 Engine Maintenance Authorizations", which is sponsored by Duncan Aviation.
READ THE BLOG HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/08/understanding-the-three-levels-of-htf7000?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_duncan_engines]]>
Need support now? Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/sites/engine-services-at-duncan-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_duncan_engines]]> and fill out the form to get in touch and a member of the Duncan Aviation team will be in touch shortly.
